alert.note: Alert for Charles City; James City; Prince George; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 7:26PM EDT until June 02 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Charles City County in east central Virginia... East central Prince George County in south central Virginia... Northeastern Sussex County in southeastern Virginia... Southwestern James City County in southeastern Virginia... Surry County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cabin Point, or near Waverly, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cabin Point around 735 PM EDT. Claremont around 755 PM EDT. Dendron around 810 PM EDT. Surry, Elberon and Scotland around 815 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Taylors Corner, Booth Fork, Carsley, Newville, Spring Grove, Gwaltney Corner, Oak Hill Corner, Ellis Fork, Savedge and Barham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; James City; Prince George; Surry; Sussex
